attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make financial institutions such as banks and building societies stop taking three days to'clear' electronic bank transfers. I understand that cheques need clearing but electronic transfers are taken immediately but take three days to appear in other accounts. Who is getting the interest on all this money that is withing this 3 day window of exchange?

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
